attributes.action: Call for Government to fire Priti Patel as International Development Secretary
attributes.background: In August, Patel met with the Prime Minister of Israel, along with other officials, whilst on a 'personal holiday'. Patel broke Ministerial Code by not informing the Foreign Office of her meetings nor recording minutes of the meetings. She must be held to account, as part of our elected Government.

rejection.details:
As you are probably aware, Ms Patel has now resigned as International Development Secretary. 

In any case, we can't accept petitions about appointments. This includes petitions calling for Cabinet Ministers to be sacked.
